issue.title: Regenerate 0.10.0 changelog
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3132](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3132). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some issues were marked with the wrong fix version. We should regenerate the 0.10.0 changelog for historical purposes

comments.body:
